overview: After 18 long years , XPW and it's mastermind founder Rob Black, are Back and on November 7th they present Rebirth live on FITE!  On this special night a 8 man tournament will take place to crown the New XPW World Heavyweight Champion. The contenders are Brian Cage, Willie Mack, Matt Cross, Bill Collier, Masada, Rhino, KC Navarro and a surprise entree. Who will become the first World Champion since the Franchise Shane Douglas?  Also on the show Shlak, G-Raver, Colin Delaney and few surprises.  Doing color commentary and hosting the historic show will be the original voice of XPW Kris Kloss.
title: XPW Rebirth
